subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Helped by a clearly offside goal by Didier Drogba, Chelsea  replaced Manchester United at the top of the Premier League by winning, 2-1, at Old Trafford on Saturday.
snippet: Helped by a clearly offside goal by Didier Drogba, Chelsea  replaced Manchester United at the top of the Premier League by winning, 2-1, at Old Trafford on Saturday.
